alert.note: Alert for Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 7:09PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL COLUMBIA AND EAST CENTRAL SUWANNEE COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EST... At 709 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Obrien, or 8 miles northwest of Ichetucknee Spring, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Columbia, Watertown, Lulu, and Five Points. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
